attributes.action: Forward your proposed "2020 LGBT+ Education Program" to the 2019 Academic Year.
attributes.additional_details:
In 2019 we celebrated 50 years since the Stonewall Riots. 
Now we are an established Community with a varied & rich History that can be taught to children at the Secondary School Level so they are learning about a powerful movement. 
That movement is once again under threat from narrow-minded parents who need to clearly learn about this brilliant & wonderfully diverse community of LGBT+ Citizens just as much as their children. 
Let's bring forward the Education Program to 2019 & learn together!
attributes.background:
Parents in Birmingham have pulled hundreds of their children out in protest against LGBT+ Classes. 
Furthermore they have now had the Classes "indefinitely suspended" which only highlights their blatant Bigotry/Ignorance. It has to stop!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take.

We aren't sure what you mean by "2020 LGBT+ Education Programme".

The Government is intending to introduce compulsory relationships and sex education into schools in 2020. You can find out more here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/social-policy/education/relationships-and-sex-education-in-schools-whats-changing/

You could start a new petition calling for this to be compulsory from September 2019 if that is something you would like to see happen.
